data.title: Summitville, OH
data.meta_description: Local info of Summitville in Columbiana county. Summitville has 111 residents in 2010-2014, ranked #1172 in Ohio state cities. Also Summitville income, school, races, crime, weather, environment and other info / rankings.
data.text:
Summitville is located in east Ohio. Summitville is part of Columbiana County. Summitville has 0.92 square miles of land area and 0.03 square miles of water area. As of 2010-2014, the total Summitville population is 111, which has grown 2.78% since 2000. The population growth rate is higher than the state average rate of 1.83% and is much lower than the national average rate of 11.61%. Summitville median household income is $41,250 in 2010-2014 and has grown by 57.14% since 2000. The income growth rate is much higher than the state average rate of 19.27% and is much higher than the national average rate of 27.36%. Summitville median house value is $81,000 in 2010-2014 and has grown by -5.48% since 2000. The house value growth rate is much lower than the state average rate of 24.98% and is much lower than the national average rate of 46.91%. As a reference, the national Consumer Price Index (CPI) inflation rate for the same period is 26.63%. On average, the public school district that covers Summitville is worse than the state average in quality. The Summitville area code is 330.
